title: Voyageurs National Park: Special Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar     Special Events               Special Events       NPS Centennial Celebration The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. Join us this year as we celebrate our service to the nation.        Gateway Communities Celebrate Check out the Gateway Communities of Voyageurs National Park and the special events and celebrations put on by our local community members.       Ghosts of Voyageurs Immerse yourself in the park's history with an evening of lanterns, laughter, and reflection as you walk through the Ghosts of Voyageurs.
